description:
Access the challenge here - [/stage-10](/stage-10)

Some code reference -

```python
def check_flag(flag) -> str:
	candidate = current_ctf_candidate()
	flag = frappe.get_value(
		"CTF Candidate Stage",
		{"stage": "STAGE-10", "parent": candidate, "correct_flag": flag},
		"correct_flag",
	)
	if flag:
		return "Your flag is " + flag
	return "Invalid flag"
```
